get_subshift: SELECT idSubShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS end_date, idShift FROM SUBSHIFT ORDER BY start_date
get_shift: SELECT idShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS end_date FROM SHIFT ORDER BY start_date
get_shift_by_orga: SELECT SHIFT_ORGA.idOrga, SHIFT.idShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS end_date FROM SHIFT_ORGA JOIN SHIFT ON (SHIFT_ORGA.idShift = SHIFT.idShift) WHERE SHIFT_ORGA.idOrga =
get_subshift_by_task: SELECT SHIFT_TASK.idTask, SUBSHIFT.idSubShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%d-%m-%Y %H:%i:%s') AS end_date  FROM SHIFT_TASK JOIN SUBSHIFT ON (SHIFT_TASK.idSubShift = SUBSHIFT.idSubShift) WHERE SHIFT_TASK.idTask =
get_orga_by_shift: SELECT * FROM ORGA WHERE idOrga IN (SELECT idOrga FROM SHIFT_ORGA WHERE idShift = %d);
get_orga_by_subshift: SELECT * FROM ORGA WHERE idOrga IN (SELECT idOrga FROM SHIFT_ORGA JOIN SUBSHIFT ON (SUBSHIFT.idShift = SHIFT_ORGA.idShift) WHERE idSubShift = %s);
get_task_by_orga: SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE idTask IN (SELECT idTask FROM SHIFT_TASK WHERE idSubShift IN (SELECT idSubShift FROM SUBSHIFT SB JOIN SHIFT_ORGA S ON SB.idShift = S.idShift WHERE idOrga = %d));
get_task_by_shift: SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE idTask IN (SELECT idTask FROM SHIFT_TASK WHERE idSubShift IN (SELECT idSubShift FROM SHIFT S JOIN SUBSHIFT SB ON SB.idShift = S.idShift WHERE S.idShift = %d));
get_task_by_subshift: SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE idTask IN (SELECT idTask FROM SHIFT_TASK WHERE idSubShift = %d);
get_task_in_subshift: SELECT DISTINCT idTask FROM SHIFT_TASK WHERE idSubShift IN %s;
get_shift_details: SELECT idShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, %s) AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, %s) AS end_date FROM SHIFT WHERE idShift = %d;
get_subshift_by_shift: SELECT idSubShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, %s) AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, %s) AS end_date FROM SUBSHIFT WHERE idShift = %d ORDER BY start_date;
get_token_by_orga: SELECT token FROM TOKEN WHERE idOrga = %s;
count_orga_by_mail: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num FROM ORGA WHERE mail = '%s';
get_task_assigned_by_orga: SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE idTask IN (SELECT idTask FROM TASK_ORGA WHERE idOrga = %s);
get_orga_assigned_by_task: SELECT * FROM ORGA WHERE idOrga IN (SELECT idOrga FROM TASK_ORGA WHERE idTask = %s);
get_subshift_between_dates: select idSubShift, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, %s) AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, %s) AS end_date from SUBSHIFT where start_date >= (select start_date from SUBSHIFT where idSubShift = %s) AND end_date <= (select end_date from SUBSHIFT where idSubShift = %s) ORDER BY start_date;
create_orga: INSERT INTO ORGA (first_name, last_name, mail, profile_pic_url) VALUES ('%s', '%s', '%s', '%s');
create_task: INSERT INTO TASK (name, description, idOrga) VALUES ('%s', '%s', %d);
create_subshift: INSERT INTO SUBSHIFT (start_date, end_date, idShift) VALUES %s;
delete_tasks: DELETE FROM TASK WHERE idTask IN %s;
delete_subshifts: DELETE FROM SUBSHIFT WHERE idSubShift IN %s;
delete_task_shift: DELETE FROM SHIFT_TASK WHERE idTask = %s AND idSubShift = %s;
delete_task_orga: DELETE FROM ORGA_TASK WHERE idTask = %s AND idOrga = %s;
